title: Andha Nilavathaan Kayyila Pudichaen Lyrics Muthal Mariyathai Song Lyrics
stanzas:
enga enga konjam
naan paakkuren
kanna moodu konjam
naan kaatturen.

mallu vaetti katti irukku
adhumela manja enna
otti irukku

muthazhagi katti pudichi
muththam kodukka
manja vandhu ottikiruchu

margazhi maasam paarthu
maarula kuliraachu
yaedhuda vambaa pochu
lavukkayum kidaiyaadhu

naan paakkuren
kanna moodu konjam
naan kaatturen.
